p: Figure 1 shows that Peak I, Peak II, Peak III, and Peak IV were separated from hydrochloric fraction 3. In addition, Peak IV presents a much stronger tyrosinase inhibitory activity (IC 50 = 4.89 μg/ml) than Peak III (IC 50 = 10.63 μg/ml), Peak II (IC 50 = 54.57 μg/ml), Peak I (IC 50 = 319.72 μg/ml), and the positive control arbutin (IC 50 = 51.54 μg/ml).
